topic.fullpath: Topic :: Internet :: Other file transfer protocol

name: Secure File Gateway
short_description: The SFGW is an event triggered store-and-forward "file relay" proxy.  This provides routing and protocol transition transparency, application and security integration, scripting extensibility, minimized administration, and greater end-user control.
